question:
Which among the following mountains and the associated mountain ranges is/are correctly matched?
  1. Matterhorn - AltaiÂ 
  2. Mt. Aconcagua - Andes
Select the correct code among the options given below:
explanation:
Matterhorn is one of the highest peaks in the Alps. It is situated on the border between Italy and Switzerland. It is 4478 metres high. It is one of the deadliest peaks of the Alps.

Mt. Aconcagua in the Andes is the highest mountain in South American continent. It is 6960 metres above sea level. It is located in Argentina.
